patterns: What do you have in stock?
responses: We offer a wide range of products including electronic components, robotic parts, measurement tools, and other technological products.
Our shop includes items like microcontrollers, sensors, motors, and more.
We have everything from resistors and capacitors to advanced robotic kits and measurement equipment.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Do you accept Mastercard or VISA?
responses: We accept VISA, Mastercard, Paypal, and several other major credit cards.
You can pay using VISA, Mastercard, and Paypal.
We accept most major credit cards and Paypal for your convenience.
Delivery typically takes 2-4 business days.
Shipping usually takes between 2-4 days.
You can expect your order to arrive within 2-4 business days.

patterns: How do I return a product?
responses: Yes, we accept returns within 30 days of purchase. The item must be in its original condition.
Our return policy allows you to return items within 30 days. Please ensure the product is unused and in original packaging.
To return a product, please contact our support team for assistance.

patterns: Do your products come with a warranty?
responses: Yes, most of our products come with a 1-year warranty.
We offer a 1-year warranty on most items. Please check the product page for specific details.
Our products generally come with a 1-year warranty. For more details, refer to the product information.

patterns: Can I get help with a product?
How do I get product support?
responses: Yes, we offer technical support for all our products. Please contact our support team.
Our technical support team is here to help you with any product issues.
You can get product support by contacting our tech support team through email or phone.
